attributes.action: Stop these robberies happening in London.
attributes.additional_details: It is affecting the tourism industry, people are afraid to visit London and are starting to travel to other countries due to not feeling safe anymore. The tourists are looking to travel to elsewhere and its not good for business. Peoples lives are always in danger of being killed for their possessions. Walking down the road has become unsafe, people cant even hold a branded bag. It has created a very bad imagine for London, this needs to stop and more needs to be done by the government.
attributes.background: Put a dedicated task force to deal with these robbery in London We want more police presence and more active CCTV we want quick police response rather than waiting an hour after the robbery has taken place. We want severe punishment for those who commit these crimes. We want Stop & Search for knife.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about policing in London are a matter for the Metropolitan Police, not the UK Government or Parliament.
